title: How can rodents like this be allowed to play the game
body:
Why is it that riot allows people who keep acting like this  play the game and ruin it for others ?
 this rodent of a human got auto-filled so decided he would either top jungle or feed then locked top 

riot please permaban this scum its not the first time the exact same person has done this.

replies.body: I feel like it should be an instant 14 day ban for people that lock in a role that they didnt get.

and the fact this probably happens a lot to people like every one will get autofilled you just have to put up with it and maybe if he asked nicely id give him the role but he said give me top or ill feed ?? like just uninstall

The entire game is filled with griefers. To be totally honest I've never played a game that has so many griefers and just plain assholes in it. It's sickening really to think that more times than not I'll either get a griefer on my team or a person who intentionally feeds. And by that I mean someone who runs it down mid , blatantly refuses to assist the team (refuses to ult, heal, exhaust or sits in the jungle the entire game whilst we lose our nexus etc).

Unfortunately Riot sit pretty much idle and do little in response to this kind of behavior. If they had a 0 policy on this type of bullshit I believe the toxicity and verbal abuse would also follow suit and decline. Majority of the time people lash out at these griefers and it's them who cop the chat bans instead of it being the other way around. I've certainly done it and copped chat bans in return.

Another thing is even when you do report these asswipes nothing appears to happen. You don't get any sort of feedback or anything and they continue to play on. I know for myself if I was in a game with a griefer or intent feeder I wouldn't be so frustrated and wanting to lash out if I knew they had a ban or some form of punishment coming their way after the game. Hell even some sort of feedback saying your report was taken into account and placed against that person for future weighting or something similar. But you get nothing, zip, nada, no feedback, no ban message... nothing. So not only do you lose the LP, waste atleast 20 minutes of your time you don't get any feedback and the other person plays on.

Pretty sad but hey? But that's League for you.

You only have to ask people what they think of League and I'm willing to bet majority of OCE players will tell you it's a toxic cesspit.
and see i dont have a problem with verbal abuse like if it gets too bad just mute them but when the are actively ruining a game which happens more often than not thats what gets to me

Exactly!  You cant physically stop somebody from inting, but you can easily mute somebody stopping them from verbal harassment.  Riot really needs to crack down on inting and griefing, something that actually ruins the game.
